headline: DuPont Water Solutions Receives Global Sustainability Leadership Award for Implementing UN SDG-6: Water for All
summary: DuPont Water Solutions today announced it has been honored with the Global Sustainability Leadership for Best Implementer of UN SDG-6: Water for All by the International Desalination and Reuse Association (IDRA).

raw.headline: DuPont Water Solutions Receives Global Sustainability Leadership Award for Implementing UN SDG-6: Water for All
raw.summary: DuPont Water Solutions today announced it has been honored with the Global Sustainability Leadership for Best Implementer of UN SDG-6: Water for All by the International Desalination and Reuse Association (IDRA).

headline: Texas AG sues 3M, DuPont over PFAS-linked products
summary: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton alleged that the companies marketed products containing the forever chemicals as safe, despite knowing of potential harms for over 50 years.

raw.headline: Texas AG sues 3M, DuPont over PFAS-linked products
raw.summary: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton alleged that the companies marketed products containing the forever chemicals as safe, despite knowing of potential harms for over 50 years.
